creator: chrisd@apache.org
text:
The worker MPM code lacks a bit of code from the prefork MPM that would allow it
to respect the GracefulShutdownTimeout value.  If the default value of zero is
used, the code works, but if a non-zero value is supplied, it is not respected
and a non-graceful shutdown begins immediately.  A patch is supplied to copy
over the necessary lines from prefork.c to worker.c.

Created attachment 17662
set cutoff from ap_graceful_shutdown_timeout

Just copies lines from prefork.c and adjusts them slightly.
